Physics

类 Vector

  • java.lang.Object
    • Physics.Vector

  • public class Vector
extends java.lang.Object
    Vector is a type of variable with magnitude and direction it is useful in physics calculation
    作者:
    WangShuzheng

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      protected double direction 
      protected double value 
      protected double valueX
      Attributes of vector it can be expressed by x and y value or magnitude and direction
      protected double valueY 

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Vector(double direction, double value) 

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void CalledIfValueIsNegtive()
      magnitude is always positive call this method to deal with negtive magnitude
      double getAngle(Vector v)
      get the angle between two vector
      double getDirection()
      get the direction of the vector the main purpose is to make correction if it is zero vector or the direction is out of bound
      Vector getReverseVector()
      get vector reversed
      double getValue()
      get the magnitude of the vector
      double getValueX()
      get the x value of vector from magnitude and direction
      double getValueY()
      get the y value of vector from magnitude and direction
      void Periodic()
      To implement the periodic of a vector its direction is from 0 to 360
      void SetZeroVector()
      set of zero vector
      Vector vectorAdd(Vector A)
      define the add of two vector
      java.lang.Double vectorMult(Vector A)
      define the Multplication of of two vector
      Vector vectorTime(double a)
      define the result of vector times a value

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 方法详细资料

      • Periodic

        public void Periodic()
        To implement the periodic of a vector its direction is from 0 to 360

      • CalledIfValueIsNegtive

        public void CalledIfValueIsNegtive()
        magnitude is always positive call this method to deal with negtive magnitude

      • SetZeroVector

        public void SetZeroVector()
        set of zero vector

      • vectorAdd

        public Vector vectorAdd(Vector A)
        define the add of two vector
        参数:
        A - another vector
        返回:
        the vector add result of this vector and A

      • vectorTime

        public Vector vectorTime(double a)
        define the result of vector times a value
        参数:
        a - a value
        返回:
        result of this vector times a

      • vectorMult

        public java.lang.Double vectorMult(Vector A)
        define the Multplication of of two vector
        参数:
        A - another vector
        返回:
        the vector multiplication result of this vector and A

      • getReverseVector

        public Vector getReverseVector()
        get vector reversed
        返回:
        the vector with reversed direction

      • getAngle

        public double getAngle(Vector v)
        get the angle between two vector
        参数:
        v - another vector
        返回:
        the angle between this and v

      • getValueX

        public double getValueX()
        get the x value of vector from magnitude and direction
        返回:
        the x value of this vector

      • getValueY

        public double getValueY()
        get the y value of vector from magnitude and direction
        返回:
        the y value of this vector

      • getDirection

        public double getDirection()
        get the direction of the vector the main purpose is to make correction if it is zero vector or the direction is out of bound
        返回:
        the y value of this vector

      • getValue

        public double getValue()
        get the magnitude of the vector
        返回:
        the magnitude of this vector
